document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of the type-species of the genera of the Cerambycidae, Disteniidae, Oxypeltidae and Vesperidae (Coleoptera) of the Neotropical Region 3213

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of the type-species of the genera of the Cerambycidae, Disteniidae, Oxypeltidae and Vesperidae (Coleoptera) of the Neotropical Region 3213

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Aerenea Thomson, 1857e: 298
(as
Aerenaea
),
Aerenea
is an incorrect subsequent spelling of
Aerenaea
in prevailing usage (Art. 33.3.1).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type-species:
Punctaerenea punctatostriata Breuning, 1948
(by original designation).

Syn.
Cognataerenea Breuning, 1971b: 286
. Comments: Breuning, 1980a: 24 described
Cognataerenea
again as a new genus and established as type-species
Aerenea cognata Pascoe, 1859
, also establish the subgenus
Cognataerenea ( Mimaerenea )
for
Cognataerea mediofasciata
.

bibRefCitation.author: Breuning
bibRefCitation.refString: Breuning, S. (1979 a) Descriptions de nouveaux genres et especes de Lamiinae (Col., Cerambycidae). Bulletin de la Societe Entomologique de Mulhouse, 1979, 13 - 15.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type-species:
Antennaerenea niveosignata Breuning, 1979
(by original designation).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Brasiliosoma Breuning, 1960: 181
nomen novum pro
Phrynosoma
Breuning, 1948a: 2
non
Phrynosoma Weigen, 1818
, Reptilia .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type-species:
Phrynosoma tibiale Breuning, 1948
(by original designation).

bibRefCitation.author: Lacordaire
bibRefCitation.refString: Lacordaire, J. T. (1830) Memoire sur les habitudes des insectes coleopteres de l'Amerique meridionale. Annales des Sciences Naturelles, 21, 149 - 194.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type-species:
Compsosoma niveosignatum Audinet-Serville, 1835
(by subsequent designation Desmarest in Chenu, 1860: 325). [=
Lamia v notata
Vigors, 1825].

Type-species:
Lamia mutillaria Klug, 1825
(by subsequent designation Monné, 1980b: 85 ).

Type-species:
Lamia v-notata Vigors, 1825
(by subsequent designation Monné, 1980b: 86 ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type-species:
Aerenea hypsiomoides Thomson, 1868
(by original designation). [=
Aerenea cognata Pascoe, 1859
].

subSubSection.paragraph:

subSubSection.paragraph:

subSubSection.paragraph:
